input_text:
Job Title: Senior Process Engineer

Location: Beaverton, OR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

We are searching for a Senior Process Engineer in Hillsboro, OR to work for an industry leading company. Candidates should have a Master's Degree in Engineering, Physics or similar, PhD is preferred, and 8+ years of experience. Experience with semiconductor manufacturing is preferred.

This is a direct hire role with great benefits.

location: Beaverton, Oregon

job type: Permanent

salary: $92,000 - 138,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: Masters

Responsibilities

Provide development support for onsite installations, development and process integration of semiconductor equipment Work in a team as well as independently support equipment process qualification, process development, improvement projects and integration projects with the customer Provide a key support role in establishing a new wafer fabrication process technology for semiconductor device manufacturing Design and run tests, analyze, summarize, and present data and conclusions Collaborate with experts from various teams to improve the manufacturing process Perform high quality evaluations on new hardware and software. Identify issues and work with the team for resolution

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 8 years of experienceEducation: Masters (required)

Skills

Process DevelopmentProcess ImprovementSemiconductor EquipmentTroubleshootingLinux

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.summary: Searching for a Senior Process Engineer in Hillsboro, OR.

Work in a team as well as independently support equipment process qualification
Support process development, improvement projects, and integration projects with the customer
Establish a new wafer fabrication process technology for semiconductor device manufacturing
Analyze, summarize, and present data and conclusions
Collaborate with experts from various teams to improve the manufacturing process
Perform high quality evaluations on new hardware and software
Identify issues and work with the team for resolution
